title: No, Celebrities Don't Need to Eat 8,000 Calories to Get Swole
description:
Hugh Jackman recently posted a photo of over 8,000 calories’ worth of boxed meals with the caption “Bulking. A day in the life.” Gossip headlines ran with the number, reporting Jackman, “is eating a bonkers 8,300 calories” to prepare for his role as Wolverine. But is he really? Does anybody do that?

Read more...

title: Get CityPASS Tickets for up to 60% Off in These Cities Right Now
description:
CityPASS is a pay-one-price bundle of tickets pass for select cities that gives you access to some of their main attractions for discounted prices: And right now, their tickets are up to 60% off.

title: Braised Scallions Are the Perfect Cheap Weeknight Side Dish
description:

title: Stop Eating Cold, Rubbery Pancakes
description:

title: 10 Psychoactive Drugs You Can Grow at Home
description:

title: ChatGPT Created Its Own Puzzle Game, and You Can Play It Right Now
description:
ChatGPT can do just about anything. It can write you a horror story about a killer clove of garlic, identify issues with your computer code, and teach you how to pronounce words in another language. It can also create new games out of thin air, and you can try one of them out right now.

title: 9 Things Your Local Bakery Is Probably Freezing
description:

description:

title: How to Choose Between Stocks and Index Funds
description:
For anyone looking to start investing in the stock market, you’ll be faced with the pros and cons of individual stocks versus index funds. Stocks are shares of a company, whereas index funds are a portfolio of stocks and bonds that tracks the stock market.
